entities.name: Fantômas poster
description: A poster of Fantômas on the wall.
Near the Fantômas poster is a poster of a bitard.

entities.name: Bitard poster
description: A poster of a bitard near the Fantômas poster.

entities.name: Hammer
description: A hammer lying under Olga Dmitrievna's bed.
The hammer lies under Olga Dmitrievna's bed, referencing the Banhammer-chan mascot.

entities.name: Map
description: A map in each cabin showing its occupants.

entities.name: Slavya and Zhenya's Cabin
description: The cabin of Slavya and Zhenya.

entities.name: Mitsgol poster
description: A poster of Mitsgol on the left wall of Slavya and Zhenya's cabin.
A poster of Mitsgol (the basis for Mitsgël, which served as the prototype for Zhenya) can be seen on the left wall.

entities.name: Famous paintings by Vasnetsov
description: Famous paintings by Vasnetsov hanging on the right wall of Slavya and Zhenya's cabin.
Famous paintings by Vasnetsov hang on the right wall.

entities.name: Books on shelves above Zhenya's bed
description: Shelves above Zhenya's bed filled with books.
The shelves above Zhenya's bed are filled with books, indicating that she reads all the time, even in her cabin (since she spends the rest of her time in the library).

entities.name: Alya and Ulyana's Cabin
description: The cabin of Alya and Ulyana.

entities.name: Detroit Metal City poster
description: A poster from the anime 'Detroit Metal City' above Alya's bed in Alya and Ulyana's cabin.
A poster from the anime 'Detroit Metal City' hangs above Alya's bed.

entities.name: Stalin poster
description: A poster of Stalin above Ulyana's bed in Alya and Ulyana's cabin.
A poster of Stalin from the game 'Stalin vs. Martians' hangs above Ulyana's bed.

entities.name: Kitten named Gav poster
description: A poster of a kitten named Gav next to the Stalin poster in Alya and Ulyana's cabin.
Next to the Stalin poster is a poster of a kitten named Gav.

entities.name: Soviet-era hockey players poster
description: A poster of Soviet-era hockey players on the other side of the Stalin poster in Alya and Ulyana's cabin.
On the other side of the Stalin poster is a poster of Soviet-era hockey players, likely one of the following: Larionov, Krutov, Fetisov, Makarov, Kasatonov.

entities.name: Wallpaper featuring drawings of a sickle and hammer
description: The wallpaper in Alya and Ulyana's cabin featuring drawings of a sickle and hammer.
The wallpaper in Alya and Ulyana's cabin features drawings of a sickle and hammer.

entities.name: Olga Dmitrievna
description: A character whose poster can be seen on the wall.
Has a poster on the wall.
Has a poster of a bitard near her poster.

entities.name: Semyon
description: A bitard depicted in posters and as the occupant of a cabin.
Depicted as the same bitard with a bag on his head in the map of counselor and Semyon's cabin.

entities.name: Fantômas
description: A character whose poster is near Olga Dmitrievna's poster.

entities.name: Bitard
description: A character referenced by multiple posters in the cabins.

entities.name: Banhammer-chan
description: A mascot whose hammer lies under Olga Dmitrievna's bed.

entities.name: Slavya
description: A character with a poster of Mitsgol on her left wall and books on her shelves.
Has a poster of Mitsgol on her left wall.

entities.name: Zhenya
description: A character with posters of Vasnetsov paintings on the right wall and books on her shelves.
Has posters of Vasnetsov paintings on the right wall.

entities.name: Mitsgol
description: The basis for Mitsgël, which served as the prototype for Zhenya.

entities.name: Vasnetsov
description: An artist whose paintings hang on the right wall of Zhenya's cabin.

entities.name: Alya
description: A character with a poster from 'Detroit Metal City' above her bed.
Has a poster from 'Detroit Metal City' above her bed.

entities.name: Ulyana
description: A character with a Stalin poster and various other posters above her bed.
Has a Stalin poster above her bed.
Has a kitten named Gav poster near Stalin's poster.
Has posters of Soviet-era hockey players next to Stalin's poster.

entities.name: Stalin
description: A character featured in the game 'Stalin vs. Martians' and in another poster on Ulyana's wall.

entities.name: Kitten named Gav
description: A poster of a kitten that is mentioned next to Stalin's poster.

entities.name: Soviet-era hockey players
description: Posters of Soviet-era hockey players near Stalin's poster.

entities.name: Detroit Metal City
description: An anime from which a poster hangs above Alya's bed.

relationships.description: Near the Fantômas poster is a poster of a bitard.
The hammer lies under Olga Dmitrievna's bed, referencing the Banhammer-chan mascot.
In the counselor and Semyon's cabin, Semyon is depicted as the same bitard with a bag on his head.
A poster of Mitsgol (the basis for Mitsgël, which served as the prototype for Zhenya) can be seen on the left wall.
Famous paintings by Vasnetsov hang on the right wall.

relationships.source: Books on shelves above Zhenya's bed
relationships.description: The shelves above Zhenya's bed are filled with books, indicating that she reads all the time, even in her cabin (since she spends the rest of her time in the library).
A poster from the anime 'Detroit Metal City' hangs above Alya's bed.
A poster of Stalin from the game 'Stalin vs. Martians' hangs above Ulyana's bed.
Next to the Stalin poster is a poster of a kitten named Gav.
On the other side of the Stalin poster is a poster of Soviet-era hockey players, likely one of the following: Larionov, Krutov, Fetisov, Makarov, Kasatonov.

relationships.source: Wallpaper featuring drawings of a sickle and hammer
relationships.description: The wallpaper in Alya and Ulyana's cabin features drawings of a sickle and hammer.
Has a poster on the wall.

Has posters of Soviet-era hockey players next to Stalin's poster.
